name: BREATHE – iPhone 14 Animated Shadow Mockup
description:
Life is stressful sometimes,

Design is stressful sometimes,

Finding the right mockup is stressful sometimes,


BUT,


Tropical leaves and plants are often absent from that list, so don't forget to to breathe and recharge, let this mockup serve as that quick reminder.


I'd love to make a full set of these depending on your feedback so please leave comments and a ♡


Alright, that's all from Izzy. I'll be posting a video about this file to my YT channel at some point so please go ahead and sub to be notified, if you're interested in that.


Happy building!


🟥 YouTube | 🌐 Design System Bud | ♡ Gumroad | 📸 IG
